scripts.pretest: dotnet fable tests/FsToolkit.ErrorHandling.Fable.Tests -o dist/tests && rollup --format=es --file=dist/tests.js dist/tests/Program.js
scripts.watch-build: dotnet fable watch tests/FsToolkit.ErrorHandling.Fable.Tests -o dist/tests --run rollup --format=es --file=dist/tests.js dist/tests/Program.js
